abstract: Saints Coach Sean Payton coached from a seat on the bench after breaking his leg and tearing a knee ligament in a first-half collision on the sideline.
snippet: Saints Coach Sean Payton coached from a seat on the bench after breaking his leg and tearing a knee ligament in a first-half collision on the sideline.
lead_paragraph: Jim Schwartz and Jim Harbaugh will get most of the headlines for their postgame altercation, but Sean Payton is making a case that he is the toughest coach in the N.F.L.

headline.main: Saints' Payton Coaching With Broken Leg
